snippet.title: Frank and Drake - Announcement trailer
snippet.description:
Turn-based narrative indie game about two housemates with different time cycles:

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1530800/Frank_and_Drake/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Frank_and_Drake
- - - - - - 
Inspired by the classic novels of Frankenstein and Dracula, the game unfolds its narrative through different written documents and there is no direct dialogue between characters. From journals to sticky notes, the storytelling will branch into different outcomes that will promote replayability to put all the pieces together.
